articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets Mauritian President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets Mauritian President
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Monday sent a message of greetings to Anerood Jugnauth, president of Mauritius, on the occasions of the 42nd anniversary of its independence and the 18th anniversary of the proclamation of its Republic.
					 Kim in the message expressed belief that the friendly relations between the two countries would grow stronger in the future and heartily wished the president and people of Mauritius greater success in the work to achieve the stability and the economic development of the country.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Chilean President
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Congratulates Chilean President
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Sebastian Pinera Echenique who will be sworn in as president of Chile.
					 Expressing belief that the relations between the two countries would favorably develop in the future, Kim in the message wished the president great success in his work for the development and prosperity of the country.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun Congratulates Chilean FM
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun Congratulates Chilean FM
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Foreign Minister of the DPRK Pak Ui Chun Thursday sent a message of congratulations to Alfredo Moreno Charme upon his appointment as foreign minister of Chile.
					 Expressing belief that the friendly and cooperative relations between the two countries would develop on a new stage, the message wished him great success in his new job.

articles.title: Yang Hyong Sop Meets Norwegian Red Cross Delegation
articles.content:
Yang Hyong Sop Meets Norwegian Red Cross Delegation
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, met and had a talk with the delegation of the Norwegian Red Cross led by Secretary General Borge Brende on Thursday when it paid a courtesy call on him at the Mansudae Assembly Hall.
					 Present there were Choe Song Ik, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Red Cross Society of the DPRK, and Finn Jarle Rode, head of the delegation of the International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies active in the DPRK.

articles.title: Russian Conservatory Delegation Here
articles.content:
Russian Conservatory Delegation Here
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- A delegation of Moscow Tchaikovsky State Conservatory of Russia led by President Alexandr Sokolov arrived here by air on Thursday.

articles.title: Gift and Letter from Chinese
articles.content:
Gift and Letter from Chinese
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il was presented with a gift and a letter by the family of Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Baozhong, a Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle.
					 They were handed to an official concerned on Thursday by Zhou Haiqiao, daughter of Zhou Baozhong's daughter and general manager of the Putong Zhiyuan Trading Co. Ltd in Beijing of China, on a visit to the DPRK.

articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK-Cuba Diplomatic Ties Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of DPRK-Cuba Diplomatic Ties Marked
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- A Cuban commodity fair and film show took place at the Cuban embassy here Thursday on the occasion of the 50th opening anniversary of diplomatic ties between the DPRK and Cuba.
					 Present there on invitation were Vice-Minister of Foreign Trade O Ryong Chol, officials concerned and diplomatic envoys of different countries here.
					
					 Ambassador Jose Manuel Galego Montano and staff members of the Cuban embassy were on hand.
					
					 The participants looked round various commodities produced in Cuba before watching a Cuban feature film.

articles.title: Preview of "The Family in Which I Live"
articles.content:
Preview of "The Family in Which I Live"
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The Korean April 25 Film Studio produced feature film "The Family in Which I Live".
					The film is based on a true story about the family of Hero Kim Kwang Chol, which works hard to repay the profound loving care and trust shown by General Secretary Kim Jong Il, always enshrining them.
					
					 Sun Hui, lead part of the film, becomes a daughter-in-law of the family of Hero Kim Kwang Chol as befitting the heroine who performed feats in the socialist construction site during her maidenhood. She displays sincerity as the wife of an officer and a mother for service persons on the frontline.
					
					 During these days she learns from the noble spirit of the Hero's parents and his brothers and the genuine family tradition. She creditably performs her duty like a cooker for the supreme command without expecting any honor.
					
					 A preview of the film took place at Taedongmun Cinema on Thursday.
					
					 Among the cinema-goers were senior party and state officials, chairpersons of the friendly parties and officials of ministries and national institutions and working people in the city.

articles.title: Korean People Vent Anger over US-S. Korean Maneuvers
articles.content:
Korean People Vent Anger over US-S. Korean Maneuvers
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- Upon receiving the recently released report of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army, all the servicepersons and people of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have let loose their anger at the reckless moves of U.S. imperialists and south Korean puppets against the DPRK.
					 KPA officer Ri Hyok Chol told KCNA that the start of the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military maneuvers has created a touch-and-go situation on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 "To cope with the grave situation we, servicepersons, will keep ourselves ready to crush down any provocation of the enemies seeking a preemptive attack, and annihilate the aggressors once given an order of action, while focusing on military training in high spirits," he said.
					
					 He also said, "If the enemy dares to intrude into our sky, land and seas even an inch, our revolutionary armed forces will mete out a decisive and merciless punishment to the invaders, fully demonstrating the invincible might of our army led by the brilliant commander."
					
					Ri Un Chon, a department director of the Ministry of Metal Industry, in an interview with KCNA said that the Korean people whose might has been enhanced remarkably under the Songun politics would mow down invaders to defend General Secretary Kim Jong Il, the great sun of the nation, and the socialist land, the cradle of their happiness.
					
					 The Korean army and people are of the view that the aggressive war racket intended to hold in check the dynamic advance of Songun Korea is an intolerable act against the Korean reunification and that it only hardens their will and resolution to remain faithful to the Songun politics of the Workers' Party of Korea. 
					
					 Workers, including those of the Kim Chaek Iron and Steel Complex and the February 8 Vinalon Complex, are now effecting a fresh upsurge in production, and such achievements have been reported in all sectors of the building of a thriving nation.

articles.title: Efforts for Modernization of National Economy
articles.content:
Efforts for Modernization of National Economy
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The Ministry of Electronics Industry of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea has made a contribution to technical updating of various economic sectors.
					 Technicians of the Designing Institute of Electronics and Automation and the Institute of Electronic Goods under the ministry have opened a vista for keeping the power production going on a high rate on the basis of up-to-date science and technology.
					
					 They developed a new kind of digital excitation control device to introduce it in the Suphung Power Station and made it possible to put the operation of the newly-built power stations such as Samsu Power Station, Orangchon Power Station No.1 and Ryesonggang Youth Power Station No. 1 on a scientific basis.
					
					 They have also renewed generating equipment while reducing the number of switchboard instruments at some 20 minor power stations.
					
					 Meanwhile, they have applied latest science and technologies to equipment of the Posan Iron Works and the Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex and settled technical problems arising in the ammonia production process by coal gasification at the Hungnam Fertilizer Complex.
					
					 The ministry is now focusing on technical remodeling of equipment of the Musan Mining Complex and other major industrial establishments.

articles.title: S. Korean Officials' Scenario to Sever Korean Relations Blasted
articles.content:
S. Korean Officials' Scenario to Sever Korean Relations Blasted
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The chief executive of south Korea, addressing a meeting commemorating the March First Popular Uprising, prattled that his regime has striven to develop the south-north relations by a fresh mode on a consistent principle and from a sincere approach. He cried out "for proving the sincerity in practice."  Hyon In Thaek in a speech made at a meeting commemorating the anniversary of the fabrication of the "Ministry of Unification" talked nonsense that "it has steered the inter-Korean relations well and they are advancing, though slow in pace." He went the lengths of calling for "crossing the threshold of the nuclear issue".
					 Minju Joson Thursday observes in a signed commentary in this regard: 
					
					 The conservative ruling forces in south Korea are contemplating finally severing the inter-Korean relations in collusion with foreign forces, pursuant to their "policy toward the north", a policy of confrontation with fellow countrymen condemned by the whole nation. This can never be tolerated.
					
					 It is an act of mocking at the nation that the conservative group advocated the absurd "principle", totally negating the north-south joint declarations. 
					
					 Their rhetoric whitewashing their criminal acts with the word "sincerity" betrays their true intention to stick to the above-said "policy toward the north" in the future, too. 
					
					 Ryu Myong Hwan, minister of "Foreign Affairs and Trade", in the so-called "strategic dialogue" with his master held in the United States, trumpeted about "two-pronged strategy for dialogue and sanctions" against the DPRK. Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint war exercises are, in fact, in their height in south Korea. 
					
					 This saber-rattling is pushing the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war. As evidenced by facts, the conservative group seeks to ignite a war of aggression against the north any moment while steadily deteriorating the inter-Korean relations under the pretext of the nuclear issue. 
					
					 The conservative forces of south Korea can never go safe in case they totally sever the inter-Korean relations. The whole nation will never pardon them.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK War Moves Protested in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK War Moves Protested in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Federation of University Students in the 21st Century released a statement on Sunday denouncing the anti-DPRK war moves of the U.S and the south Korean puppet bellicose forces.
					 The statement pointed out that the war maniacs are massively hurling huge armed forces and ultra-modern military hardware into the joint military exercises soon to be staged under the scenario for a war of aggression against the DPRK the core of which is to mount a preemptive attack on it.
					
					 This dangerous saber-rattling is a product of the ill-natured confrontation policy toward the DPRK pursued by the U.S and the south Korean authorities, it charged.
					
					 Saying that the present authorities' talk about a will to improve the inter-Korean relations is doubtful since they are getting hell-bent on large-scale war exercises to further aggravate the tension on the Korean Peninsula, the statement urged them to respect the spirit of the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration and stop at once the war games aimed at invasion of the DPRK.

articles.title: Policy of Discrimination against Women Blasted in S. Korea
articles.content:
Policy of Discrimination against Women Blasted in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The Joint Planning Team for March 8 World Women's Day and members of women's organizations in education, health and public fields in south Korea held a rally in Seoul on March 6 in demand of the withdrawal of the puppet authorities' policy of discrimination against women.
					 Speakers at the rally charged that the present "government's" policy on women gets worse day by day and, accordingly, the position of women is festering.
					
					 They said that a lot of women turn to be part-time workers and get paid less wages for hard labor they were forced to do under bad conditions. They also deplored that women have not been guaranteed rights to childbirth, child upbringing and education, etc.
					
					 Stressing the need to put an end to all the discrimination and pressure on women without fail, they called upon all of them to turn out in the struggle to gain rights of women.

articles.title: US-S. Korea War Exercises Denounced in Finland
articles.content:
US-S. Korea War Exercises Denounced in Finland
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The Finland-Korea Society and the Finish National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea issued a joint statement on Mar. 5 in denunciation of the war moves of the United States and the south Korean puppet warmongers.
					 The statement said that the Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises are war games to make a surprise preemptive attack on the DPRK from A to Z as huge armed forces and up-to-date military equipment and even militia are involved in them. 
					
					 Due to the reckless war exercises being conducted by the United States and south Korea, the situation on the Korean Peninsula is inching close to the brink of war, the statement noted, and added:
					
					 The joint military exercises are extremely dangerous as they not only harass peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula but threaten the situation on the Northeast Asian region as a whole. 
					
					 It strongly urged the United States and south Korea to immediately stop the war gambling.

articles.title: Discrimination against Korean Schools in Japan Flailed
articles.content:
Discrimination against Korean Schools in Japan Flailed
 Pyongyang, March 11 (KCNA) -- The Society of Influential Lawyers Thinking of the Issue of Foreign and National Schools of Japan presented a written request to the prime minister and the minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology on March 5 urging them to grant all students equal rights to learning and not to discriminate against Korean schools.
					 The proposal to exclude Korean schools from the list of state assistance to senior high schools raises lots of legal problems, the request said, asserting that the discrimination against the Korean schools is a serious abuse of rights of their students.
					
					 Lawyer Yoshiharu Yoshimine, when interviewed at the ministry that day, noted that it is wrong to exclude the Korean schools from the state assistance in view of the Japanese Constitution and the international treaty.
					
					 On March 2, 13 teachers of Kyoto University including Honorary Prof. Masaaki Ueta jointly thrust a letter of request to the prime minister and the minister of Education, Culture, Sports, Science and Technology requesting them not to exclude the Korean schools in Japan from the list of state assistance and honor election commitments.
					
					 Criticizing the stance of linking the issue of assistance to the Korean schools in Japan with the issue of relations with the DPRK, the letter noted that such attitude is just like jumbling politics and diplomacy with education.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno fabricas de ciudad de Huichon
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il dirige sobre terreno fabricas de ciudad de Huichon
Pyongyang, 11 de marzo (ATCC) -- El Dirigente Kim Jong Il, Secretario General del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, dirigio sobre el terreno fabricas de la ciudad de Huichon en gran auge revolucionario.
					El Dirigente estuvo primero en la Fabrica Electrica Chilsong acondicionada modernamente.
					
					En su recorrido por varios lugares de la fabrica incluyendo el taller de tuberia, hizo conocimiento en detalles del estado de reconstruccion tecnica y de produccion.
					
					Aprecio altamente los meritos de los funcionarios, los obreros y los tecnicos de la fabrica mostrandose muy satisfecho de que ellos hayan elevado subitamente la calidad de los productos electricos al modernizar sobre la base cientifica los procesos productivos con sus fuerzas y tecnicas propias y librar ampliamente el movimiento por la innovacion tecnologica.
					
					Esta fabrica juega un papel importante para el desarrollo economico del pais, senalo y presento las tareas programaticas que se presentan ante ella.
					
					Seguidamente, el dirigio la Fabrica de Ceramica de Huichon.
					
					Luego de escuchar explicaciones sobre el estado de produccion, se entero en detalles del estado de investigacion y desarrollo recorriendo el proceso de produccion de ladrillo refractario construido por la fabrica por cuenta propia.
					
					Muy complacido de que los funcionarios, los tecnicos y los obreros de la fabrica hayan implantado el sistema de produccion de ladrillo refractario basado en las materias primas nacionales manifestando su extraordinaria creatividad, evaluo altamente los exitos logrados por ellos en su lucha.
					
					Subrayo que las bases de produccion construidas a duras penas contribuyen ahora sustancialmente al desarrollo economico y al mejoramiento de la vida del pueblo y destaco que gracias a la poderosa base de economia independiente dotada de tecnologias ultramodernas, se realizara sin falta el proposito de nuestro partido de registrar un cambio decisivo en la vida del pueblo.
					
					Presento las tareas que se presentan ante la fabrica diciendo que ella ocupa la posicion importante para la materializacion de la orientacion de dar prioridad a la vida del pueblo.
					
					A continuacion, el Dirigente recorrio la Fabrica Combinada de Maquinas Herramientas de Huichon en que se introdujo plena y magnificamente la tecnologia CNC al estilo coreano.
					
					Pasando revista al nuevamente construido taller de colada y a las nuevas maquinas herramientas, se informo en detalles del estado de construccion y de produccion.
					
					Subrayando que los obreros de la fabrica situaron en el nivel mundial la industria de maquinaria con su firme voluntad digna de los creadores del espiritu de Kanggye, anadio que la toma de la heguemonia de la tecnologia CNC constituye otra orgullosa victoria alcanzada en la epoca del Songun.
					
					Destaco que en la actual epoca de economia basada en la intelectualidad, el explorador de la tecnologia de punta es el conquistador y el vencedor del futuro y agrego que bajo la consigna "!Conquistemos la tecnologia de punta en todos los dominios de la construccion de gran potencia prospera y saltemos a lo mas alto y mas rapido!", todas las ramas y unidades deben impulsar energicamente la modernizacion basada en las ciencias y tecnicas sofisticadas.
					
					Afirmo que si la mas revolucionaria idea y fuerzas armadas nuestras se combinan con la ciencia y tecnica de punta, se podra lograr el gran cambio en la revolucion y la construccion y nuestra patria sera invencible potencia y verdadero paraiso prospero del pueblo.
					
					Diciendo que el Combinado de Maquinas Herramientas de Huichon tiene gran importancia para el desarrollo de la industria de maquinaria del pais, el Dirigente indico las tareas programaticas que incumben a ella.
					
					Definio la meta a alcanzar en un corto plazo y dilucido el rumbo y los remedios para el respecto enfatizando que la fabrica debe seguir avanzando hacia la meta cientifico-tecnica mas alta basandose en la exitosa introduccion de la tecnologia CNC.
					
					Exhorto encarecidamente a los obreros de la fabrica a producir un gran auge en la produccion de maquinas herramientas poniendo de pleno manifiesto su abnegacion patriotica para que en esta fabrica, donde en el pasado repercutieron las "!Vivas 10 mil maquinas herramientas!", resuenen estruendosas "!Vivas 10 mil maquinas herramientas CNC!".
					
					Terminada la direccion sobre las fabricas, el Dirigente se dirigio al lugar de interes historico-revolucionario del valle Kumsu en el barrio de Taehung de la ciudad de Huichon.
					
					En este lugar historico el Presidente Kim Il Sung estuvo los 26 y 28 de febrero de 1953 durante la enconada Guerra de Liberacion de la Patria e indico el rumbo de desarrollo de la industria de maquinaria del pais y el camino a seguir por la Fabrica de Maquinas de Precision de Huichon.
					
					Escuchando las explicaciones de guia, dio vueltas con gran emocion por los edificios historicos que se mantienen en su figura original.
					
					Diciendo que el Presidente es el gran hombre sin par quien con su gran perspicacia y larga prevision, habia disenado ya en los dias de plena guerra el proyecto de construccion de la patria triunfada, llamo encarecidamente a cumplir con exito la causa de construccion de la gran potencia prospera para llevar a la realidad cuanto antes el deseo de toda la vida del Presidente.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario responsable del Comite del Partido del Trabajo de Corea en la Provincia de Jagang, Pak To Chun, los jefes de departamento del Comite Central del PTC, Kim Kyong Hui y Jang Song Thaek, y los primeros subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Ju Kyu Chang, Ri Je Gang y Ri Jae Il.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje al presidente chileno
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam envia mensaje al presidente chileno 
Pyongyang, 11 de marzo (ATCC) -- El presidente del Presidium de la Asamblea Popular Suprema de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, Kim Yong Nam, envio el dia 11 un mensaje a Sebastian Pinera Echenique para felicitar su toma de posesion como presidente de la Republica de Chile. 
					El remitente expresa la conviccion de que las relaciones entre Corea y Chile se desarrollaran positivamente en lo adelante y desea al destinatario grandes exitos en su labor para el desarrollo y la prosperidad del pais.

articles.title: Pak Ui Chun envia mensaje a su homologo chileno
articles.content:
Pak Ui Chun envia mensaje a su homologo chileno 
Pyongyang, 11 de marzo (ATCC) -- El canciller coreano Pak Ui Chun envio el dia 11 un mensaje de felicitacion a su homologo chileno, Alfredo Moreno Charme, recien nombrado. 
					  El remitente expresa su conviccion de que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre los dos paises se desarrollaran en una nueva etapa y desea al destinatario grandes exitos en el cumplimiento de su nuevo cargo.

articles.title: Sesiona primera reunion de la junta de directores del BND
articles.content:
Sesiona primera reunion de la junta de directores del BND
Pyongyang, 11 de marzo (ATCC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 10 en el Hotel Internacional Yanggakdo la primera reunion de la junta de directores del Banco Nacional para el Desarrollo (BND).
					 En la ocasion estuvieron presentes los directores de dicha junta del BND y los funcionarios correspondientes en calidad de observadores.
					
					 Ante todo, se dio lectura a la resolucion del Comite de Defensa Nacional (CDN) de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea "Sobre la fundacion del Banco Nacional para el Desarrollo". 
					
					La junta de directores se compone del CDN de la RPDC, el Comite Coreano por la Paz de Asia y el Pacifico, una oficina interesada, el Ministerio de Finanzas, el Grupo de Inversion Internacional Taepung de Corea (GIITC) y 2 directores independientes.
					
					 Como director general y subdirector general de la citada junta del BNDC fueron elegidos Jon Il Chun, representante del CDN de la RPDC, y Pak Chol Su, coreano residente en China, respectivamente.
					
					La reunion analizo y saco el proyecto del estatuto del BND, el plan de operacion del BND y su proyecto del presupuesto financiero para el 99 (2010) de la Era Juche, el estatuto del comite de especialistas del BND y el proyecto del aparato administrativo del BND.
					
					 Esta entidad crediticia actuara como organo financiero general que teniendo la normativa y el sistema financieros modernos que le permitiran las transacciones con las instituciones financieras y bancos comerciales internacionales, estara a cargo de cumplir las gestiones inversionistas en los importantes proyectos segun la politica estatal y las funciones de banco comercial.

articles.title: Minju Joson fustiga a las fuerzas conservadoras del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Minju Joson fustiga a las fuerzas conservadoras del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 11 de marzo (ATCC) -- Al pronunciar recientemente el llamado "discurso en conmemoracion del Primero de Marzo", el mandatario surcoreano dijo unas palabras egolatras como que "ellos (autoridades surcoreanas) han venido esforzandose por abrir las relaciones Sur-Norte con el nuevo modo manteniendo el principio invariable y la sinceridad" y anadio que "hay que mostrar la sinceridad con la accion".
					En tanto, Hyon In Thaek senalo en su "discurso conmemorativo" de la organizacion del "Ministerio de Reunificacion" que ellos "han venido conduciendo bien las relaciones Sur-Norte" y "estos vinculos avanzan aunque lentamente". Para colmo, disparateo que las relaciones intercoreanas "deben pasar el umbral del problema nuclear".
					
					Revela asi el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual de este jueves y prosigue:
					
					 No se puede perdonar nunca que las fuerzas conservadoras en el Poder del Sur de Corea pretendan llevar a la ruptura total las relaciones intercoreanas en contubernio con las fuerzas foraneas practicando obstinadamente su "politica sobre el Norte" de caracter fratricida, repudiada por toda la nacion. 
					
					  La banda de conservadores niega totalmente las declaraciones conjuntas aprobadas entre ambas partes y esgrime ese tan absurdo "principio", lo cual es un crimen que burla a la nacion.
					
					  Embellecer este crimen con la palabra de "sinceridad" significa que ellos seguiran practicando su "politica sobre el Norte" de caracter fratricida. 
					
					  Hace poco, el ministro de "Relaciones Exteriores y de Comercio", Ryu Myong Hwan, sostuvo en EE.UU. con su amo el llamado "dialogo estrategico", en que abogo por la "'estrategia dual' consistente en aplicar paralelamente el dialogo y la sancion" sobre la RPDC. 
					
					  Efectivamente, se libran ahora en el suelo surcoreano los ejercicios belicos conjuntos "Key Resolve" y "Aguilucho" que llevan la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana al borde de guerra. 
					
					  Como insinuan los hechos, la camarilla de conservadores surcoreanos intenta provocar en cualquier momento la guerra de agresion al Norte al cabo de empeorar de continuo las relaciones Norte-Sur pretextando el problema nuclear. 
					
					  Pero, esa horda no podra salir ilesa si rompe totalmente las relaciones N-S porque no la perdonara jamas toda la nacion coreana.
